text: A serious Credits theme for a serious game with a serious protagonist. I've never actually played this game but always was curious to, especially with Treasure being the developer. Speaking of Treasure, what's going on with them? They haven't done anything in years.
author: SupraDarky

text: This game is mouthwatering, I know that feeling. Sadly it felt too short for me, but this game is a good Wario game which I think should be more of. Nintendo come on! experiment with your past IP's and creations.
author: Philip J. Fry II

text: Virtual Boy: Wario Land is BY FAR the best Wario Land game, better than even 2 & 3 :-)
author: Roberth Anthony Martinez Rivero

text: nuahSY VB:Wario Land has a run feature, by pressing L or R, It has LOADS of secret stuffs & rooms, and it's a very aggresive game when it comes to speedrunning :-D
author: Roberth Anthony Martinez Rivero

text: Despite its slightly underwhelming length and its repetitive combat, I really like Wario World. Interesting puzzles and mini-challenges everywhere, lots of cool boss fights, and it just has that inherent satisfaction that comes with most collect-a-thons, at least in my eyes.
author: Jonochrome

text: I've always thought VB Wario Land would be obvious to remake on the 3DS
author: EvilMariobot

text: There doesn't seem to be too many Wario themes from the list. I'll suggest Wario Land 4 - Doodle Woods.
